subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: To Larry Bowa, a day like Saturday, when Robinson Canó made three errors in the Yankees’ 10-7 loss to the Mets, reinforces the feeling that Canó has much to prove.
snippet: To Larry Bowa, a day like Saturday, when Robinson Canó made three errors in the Yankees’ 10-7 loss to the Mets, reinforces the feeling that Canó has much to prove.
